HomePage.description: Specialized in mobile app development, modern web solutions, and artificial intelligence systems. I transform ideas into innovative digital experiences.

TerminalSection.title: Setting Up Environment
TerminalSection.description: Installing the professional skills that make the difference.
TerminalSection.footer: Software development is like solving complex puzzles: every line of code matters.

ResponsiveSection.title: Responsive Design
ResponsiveSection.description: Every project I develop is optimized to work perfectly on any device, from mobile to desktop.
ResponsiveSection.footer: User experience is consistent regardless of the screen from which they access.

TabsSection.title: My Favorite Tech Stack
TabsSection.description: If I had to choose a favorite tech stack to develop a complete project, this would be my ideal arsenal for creating robust and scalable solutions.

fastapi.description: Modern and fast Python framework for building robust APIs with automatic documentation and type validation.

nextjs.description: Production-ready React framework with hybrid rendering, automatic optimization and superior developer experience.

mongodb.description: Scalable and flexible NoSQL database that handles large volumes of data with dynamic schemas efficiently.

kotlin.description: Modern language for native Android development with concise syntax and Java interoperability.

swift.description: Apple's powerful and intuitive language for creating high-performance native iOS applications.

railway.description: Modern deployment platform that simplifies application hosting with automatic CI/CD.

figma.description: Collaborative design tool for creating professional user interfaces and interactive prototypes.

claude.description: AI development assistant that accelerates programming with intelligent suggestions and code generation.

Technologies.title: Technical Skills
Technologies.description: My experience ranges from UX/UI design to infrastructure, allowing me to lead end-to-end projects with a comprehensive development vision.
Technologies.additionalInfo: My stack constantly evolves, always exploring new tools that allow me to create better solutions and stay up-to-date with the latest development trends.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Modern and responsive interfaces with React, Vue, Next.js for exceptional user experiences.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Robust and scalable APIs using Laravel, FastAPI, Python for solid enterprise systems.

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.description: Native development with Kotlin, Swift and cross-platform with web technologies for high-performance mobile apps.
